entities.name: Professor Sprout
entities.description: The professor is introduced as the one who said 'Greenhouse Three today, chaps!' and seems to be disgruntled.

entities.name: Greenhouse One
entities.description: It is mentioned that they had only ever worked in Greenhouse One before.

entities.name: Greenhouse Three
entities.description: Professor Sprout mentions Greenhouse Three and it is described as housing far more plants than Greenhouse One.

relationships.description: Professor Sprout works at Greenhouse Three, which is evident from her mention of it and the fact that she is in charge.
It is mentioned that they had only ever worked in Greenhouse One before, indicating a past relationship between them and Greenhouse One.
